title: Find and open sales orders
purpose: Use the Sales Orders page to search active orders and open an order workspace.
whenToUse: You need to locate an order by number, customer, or status.
You need to start a new order from the order board.
prerequisites: You are signed in with a role that can view sales orders.
Order data exists for the selected site scope.
stepByStepActions: Select a row to open the order workspace.
Select Create New Order to start a draft order.
expectedResult: Matching orders are displayed and row selection opens the order detail workspace.

commonErrorsAndRecovery.cause: API request failed or the service is temporarily unavailable.
recovery: Escalate to MES support if repeated failures continue.

escalationPath: Contact site MES support lead and include the order number and timestamp.
